meaningMnemonic:
When it comes to <kanji>build</kanji>ing and <kanji>construct</kanji>ing, the thing that encompasses both of them is <vocabulary>architecture</vocabulary>.

建築 refers to the design and <vocabulary>construction</vocabulary> of buildings. Occasionally it can also refer to a physical building itself, but for that it's more common to use 建築物.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
